Web
Solution

Take Your Web Solution Skills to New Heights with Our Comprehensive Course Led By Experts and Gain Competitive Advantage in the Market-place

Our Web Solutions course is carefully designed to give you an in-depth understanding of the principles and practices involved in creating and managing effective web solutions. Are you a business owner aspiring to establish a strong online presence or an entrepreneur seeking to launch a successful web-based venture? This course provides you with the skills you need to thrive in this exciting field.

Sign Up Now To Get A 20% Discount

Web Solutions

Our course is tailored specifically for beginners and provides a practical approach to learning with real-world case studies, interactive exercises, and feedback from industry professionals. By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped with the skills and knowledge necessary to succeed in your web-based business endeavours.

Program Overview

The Web Solutions course offers learners a comprehensive understanding of the web solutions industry, focusing on essential strategies and tools for launching, managing, and expanding successful web-based ventures. The program covers a diverse array of topics, including WordPress web design, SEO, website credibility, responsive web design, web integration, and hosting, providing a well-rounded knowledge base to excel in the field of web solutions.

  • WordPress Web Design

  • Search Engine Optimization

  • Responsive Web Design

  • E-Commerce Solutions

  • WordPress Themes

  • Web Hosting

  • Web Credibility

  • Domain Management

  • Web Integrations

LIFE AS A WEB SOLUTIONS PROFESSIONAL

Web solutions professionals lead a dynamic and ever-evolving life. They stay updated with the latest technologies and design trends through continuous learning. Working on a project basis, they collaborate with clients and teams, ensuring the timely delivery of high-quality web solutions. Problem-solving is at the heart of their work, as they troubleshoot technical issues and find innovative solutions.

Creativity and innovation drive their work, designing visually appealing websites and creating intuitive user experiences. They constantly explore new technologies and think outside the box to deliver engaging web solutions.

In the fast-paced web solutions industry, being adaptable is a must. Professionals embrace change, upgrade their skills, and stay ahead of emerging trends. The best part is that they often have flexible work arrangements, allowing them to strike a healthy balance between work and personal life. While remote work and flexible schedules are typical, they are dedicated to meeting project deadlines and client demands.

To sum it up, being a web solutions professional is both challenging and rewarding. They continuously learn, collaborate, and solve problems to deliver innovative web solutions. Their creative approach and adaptability enable them to excel in this ever-evolving field while maintaining a good work-life balance.

Career Advantages

High demand

The demand for web solutions professionals is skyrocketing. In today's digital world, businesses of all sizes and industries require a strong online presence to reach their target audience. As a web solutions expert, you'll be in high demand, with a wealth of job opportunities available to you.

Career growth opportunities

With the high demand for web solutions expertise, professionals in this field often enjoy competitive salaries. Your specialized skills and ability to create impactful web solutions will make you a valuable asset to organizations. This translates into attractive compensation packages and financial stability.

Flexibility

Web solutions professionals possess a wide range of skill-sets that cut across multiple industries. You'll develop expertise in areas such as web design, content management systems, and digital marketing. This range of skills opens up a world of possibilities, allowing you to explore various career paths within the web solutions industry.

High earning potential

If you dream of being your own boss or working independently, the web solutions industry offers you opportunities for entrepreneurship. With your expertise, you can start your own web solutions business, work as a freelancer, or even build and sell digital products or services. This level of autonomy and flexibility is a major advantage if you are seeking a more independent career path.

Possibilities for Consulting

As a web solutions professional, you'll have the opportunity to unleash your creativity and showcase your innovative ideas through your work. You'll be able to design visually appealing websites, craft intuitive user experiences, and discover unique solutions that cater to the specific needs of your clients. This aspect of creativity will add a fulfilling and artistic dimension to your career, allowing you to express yourself and make a lasting impact through your work.

Overall, being a web solutions expert can be a rewarding and fulfilling career with many opportunities for growth and success.

What career will this programme prepare me for?

  • Web designer

  • Digital marketing specialist

  • E-commerce specialist

  • UI/UX designer

There are extra advantages of taking the web solutions course at our institution. You will acquire the skills required for professional success, thanks to our knowledgeable instructors and hands-on learning style. We offer personalized attention to all students, and our curriculum is designed to meet the needs of both beginners and more advanced learners. With access to a wealth of resources and the support of a dynamic community of learners and professionals, you will have everything you need to become a successful web solutions expert.

How You Will Learn

Methods: Virtual and Physical classes, Business case-studies, Virtual projects, and Interactive quizzes.

Virtual Classes

You will participate in live virtual classes that will provide a platform for discussions, question-and-answer sessions, and feedback. The classes are designed to be interactive, with students encouraged to ask questions and participate in group discussions.

Business Case Studies

You'll have the opportunity to delve into actual case studies and examples from the web solutions industry, gaining valuable insights and hands-on experience from them. Through these case studies, you'll explore the strategies and tactics employed by successful web solutions professionals to achieve their goals, and also develop a deeper understanding of the challenges and opportunities within the web solutions landscape. In the end, you will be able to apply these insights to your own web projects and ventures, enhancing your problem-solving skills and decision-making abilities.

Projects

You will get hands-on experience by working on practical projects that apply the concepts you've learned in the web solutions course. You'll have the opportunity to create and enhance websites, develop effective marketing strategies, and analyze the performance of web solutions. Industry experts will provide feedback and guidance throughout the project, boosting your confidence and competence in the field of web solutions.

Interactive Quizzes

The program includes interactive quizzes that will test your understanding of the concepts and tools covered in each module. The quizzes are designed to be engaging and will provide instant feedback on the student's performance.

What You Will Learn

The Web Solutions course offers a comprehensive curriculum designed to equip you with the knowledge and skills necessary to excel in the dynamic field of web solutions. Through 10 modules, you will embark on a transformative learning journey, exploring various aspects of web solutions and acquiring the expertise to launch, manage, and expand successful web-based ventures.

  • Module 1
  • Module 2
  • Module 3
  • Module 4
  • Module 5
  • Module 6
  • Module 7
  • Module 8
  • Module 9
  • Module 10

Introduction to Web Solutions

Understanding the importance of web solutions

Exploring the evolution and current trends in web solutions

Edit Content

Website Design (WordPress)

Basics of web design principles and user experience (UX)

Website design with WordPress

Responsive web design

Edit Content

Web Hosting and Domain Management

Overview of web hosting services and types

Domain registration and management

Configuring and managing email accounts and databases

Edit Content

Web Integration and APIs

Integrating third-party services and APIs into websites

Working with popular web services and APIs (e.g., payment gateways, social media)

Security considerations for web integrations

Edit Content

Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

Understanding SEO principles and techniques

Optimizing websites for search engine visibility

Keyword research, on-page optimization, and link-building strategies

Edit Content

Web Analytics and Performance Optimization

Introduction to web analytics tools and metrics

Analyzing website performance and user behavior

Strategies for optimizing website speed, loading times, and overall performance

Edit Content

Paid Advertising for Lead Generation

Introduction to paid advertising platforms (Google Ads, Facebook Ads, etc.)

Setting up and managing paid advertising campaigns

Tracking and optimizing paid advertising for lead generation

Edit Content

E-commerce Solutions

Introduction to e-commerce platforms and solutions

Setting up online stores and product catalogs

Payment gateways, order processing, and inventory management

Edit Content

Web Project Management and Client Communication

Project planning and organization for web solutions

Effective communication with clients and stakeholders

Managing timelines, resources, and expectations

Edit Content

Emerging Trends in Web Solutions

Exploring new technologies and frameworks

Understanding the impact of AI, voice interfaces, and the Internet of Things (IoT)

Future directions and career opportunities in web solutions

Class Requirements

  • 4 weeks, 11-12 hours/week

  • Access to a laptop or desktop computer with a minimum of 4gig ram, and 256g SSD or 500g HDD Rom.

  • Access to a stable internet connection

  • Proficiency in written and spoken English

Testimonials

My job was one of the things that took a hit during the pandemic. I was devastated by this but a respected senior friend convinced me to go and improve my skills at PDMA so I'd be indispensable. He wasn't wrong. In 4 short weeks, the improvement was so obvious and profound that Lagos Business School approached me. In a very short while, using what I learned at PDMA, I did not just land a job, I rose to Manager ranks at Lagos Business School. Looking back, I am glad the last job ended...but I am most glad I went to PDMA.
Toba OlugosiClient Relationship Manager, Lagos Business School
After graduating from University, I knew needed digital skills if this economy was going to favor me. It didn’t take long to find PDMA, and I am glad I did. My experience at PDMA positioned me to land a job right after my graduation where I manage local international brands…it didn’t even take time to happen. I am really happy cos truly when you weigh it against the value you get, PDMA is just doing giveaways to help people like me get their lives started. PDMA Should Charge More
Ifeoluwa IsraelContent Writer
I AM DOING WELL! I loved marketing, the only problem was I didn't know how to do it. I knew I had to start from somewhere and I am glad I started from PDMA. PDMA started from the basics of marketing before we went into digital marketing and that was my eureka moment. I would have just known the tools and been totally clueless about converting customers. Today, I am the lead strategist for several multination brands and I can't even lie, PDMA laid the foundation for this career I am enjoying today.
Benjamin IkadeCreative Strategist, Xpark360

Frequently Asked Questions

WHAT IS DIGITAL MARKETING?

Digital marketing means using the internet and digital tools to promote products, services, and brands. It's about getting more people to know about a business and trust it by sharing ads and helpful content to bring in new customers and keep the current ones happy.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN LAGOS?

Digital marketing courses are reasonably priced, and the cost may differ depending on the institute. With a budget ranging from 150,000 to 300,000, you can acquire valuable digital marketing skills.

WHAT IF I AM NOT CLOSE TO THE VENUE OF THE TRAINING?

If you live far from the training location and can't come to class regularly, you can use our online platform. It lets you learn at your own speed and convenience. Visit pdmaonline.com to learn more about our digital marketing courses online.

WHICH CERTIFICATION IS THE BEST?

There are several good certifications for digital marketing, including:Premium Digital Marketing Academy Certification, Facebook Blueprint Certification, Google Analytics IQ Certification, Hootsuite Social Marketing Certification, Google Ads Certification, Zeo Digital Academy, Chartered Institute of Social Media Marketing and Digital Marketing, etc. 

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING DOES PDMA OFFER?

PDMA offers several digital marketing training programs, including in-class training, corporate training, and online training.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course in Nigeria can vary depending on the academy, but you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN THE PAYMENTS BE DONE IN INSTALLMENTS FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE?

Yes, you can make payments in installments for our digital marketing course, but the full payment should be completed before the class ends.

IS THERE A CERTIFICATE AT THE END OF THE DIGITAL MARKETING PROGRAM?

Yes. Upon completion of the digital marketing training, you will receive a certificate. Additionally, PDMA will guide you on how to obtain certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other relevant international digital marketing certification bodies

Our training programs include: In-class training, Corporate training, and Online training



WHAT DOES A DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course can vary depending on the academy. In Nigeria, you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN I PAY FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE IN INSTALLMENTS?

Yes, you can pay in installments, but please ensure full payment is made before the class ends.

DO I RECEIVE A CERTIFICATE AFTER COMPLETING THE DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING?

Absolutely, you'll receive a certificate once you finish the course, including all assignments and projects. We'll even assist you in obtaining certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other important international digital marketing bodies.

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES ARE INCLUDED IN THE PROGRAM?

Our curriculum covers a wide range of courses, including: Online Marketing Strategy, Lead Generation, Sales Conversion, and Website Credibility, Web Design (WordPress),  Email Marketing, Fundamentals of Graphic Design, Google Analytics, Content Marketing/Copywriting, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and Search Engine Marketing (SEM).

ARE THESE DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES INCLUDED IN THE PACKAGE?

Yes. When you enroll, you'll receive training in all these courses. However, if you prefer to specialize in just one or a few of these courses, we offer customized packages to meet your specific needs.
